misdeed: Fishermen in a coastal village are reporting increasingly strange catches. Their nets are filled with bizarre, deformed fish, their boats are rocked by unseen forces, and some claim to hear a haunting melody drifting across the waves.
solution: The Vaesen is a Mermaid and can be placated with offerings of trinkets and treasures or driven away by the presence of a married man wearing his wedding ring.

clues.description: The deformed fish bear strange markings on their scales, resembling ancient runes or symbols.
The sea, usually teeming with life, grows eerily quiet on certain nights, the silence broken only by the sound of waves lapping against the hulls of boats.
Local children report seeing a woman with shimmering scales and long, flowing hair swimming alongside their boats, but she disappears when adults are present.
An old sailorâ€™s tale speaks of a mermaid who lures men to watery graves with her beauty and enchanting voice.
A fisherman claims to have pulled a comb made of bone and seaweed from his net, carved with intricate images of sea creatures.
The haunting melody seems to emanate from a cluster of rocks just offshore, a place shrouded in mist and local superstition.

plotTwist.description: A young woman, abandoned at the altar by her sailor lover, has unknowingly formed a pact with the Vaesen, offering her broken heart in exchange for power over the sea.
